channel.title: Poetries on HOME

item.title: Baqaadgi
item.description: Tumhe shayad ehsaas nahi ho raha, par waqt itni tezi se guzarta ja raha hai ki tumhe kuch mehsoos tak nahi hota. Wahi 5-6 kapde, wahi purane joote, aur wahi office se ghar tak ke rasteâ€”din kab haath se phisalte jaate hain, maloom hi nahi chalta. Is monotony mein yaaddash dhundli hoti jati hai aur saal kab guzar jata hai, pata nahi chalta. Isi tarah tum 20 se 21 ke ho gaye aur jald hi 30 ki dehleez tak pohunch jaoge.
